text: Mathias Flückiger (born 27 September 1988) is a Swiss mountain bike racer. He rode at the cross-country event at the 2016 Summer Olympics. His brother Lukas is also a cyclist. ==Major results== ;2008 : 3rd Cross-country, European Under-23 Mountain Bike Championships ;2010 : 1st 20px Cross-country, World Under-23 Mountain Bike Championships : 1st 20px Cross-country, European Under-23 Mountain Bike Championships ;2012 : 3rd 15px Cross-country, World Mountain Bike Championships ;2013 : 6th Overall UCI Mountain Bike World Cup ;2014 : 6th Overall UCI Mountain Bike World Cup ;2015 : 5th Overall UCI Mountain Bike World Cup ;2016 : 5th Overall UCI Mountain Bike World Cup : 6th Cross-country, Summer Olympics ;2018 : 1st 20px Cross-country, National Mountain Bike Championships : 6th Overall UCI Mountain Bike World Cup ::1st Mont-Sainte-Anne ;2019 : UCI Mountain Bike World Cup ::1st Albstadt ::3rd Nové Město : 2nd 15px Cross-country, UCI Mountain Bike World Championships ;2020 : 2nd 15px Cross-country, UCI Mountain Bike World Championships ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Switzerland Category:Swiss mountain bikers
title: Mathias Flückiger
